categories: Category:Ewoks: The Battle for Endor actors

nodes.text: Anthony Wilford Brimley (September 27, 1934 – August 1, 2020) portrayed the hermit Noa Briqualon in Ewoks: The Battle for Endor (1985).
Brimley is better known from films such as The Hotel New Hampshire, John Carpenter's The Thing, The China Syndrome, Absence of Malice, The Natural, Cocoon and The Firm.
An early concept for Rio Durant from Solo: A Star Wars Story was based on Brimley.
